mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MENUS ( MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_SEQ ) VALUES ( #{ menu_id }, #{ menu_name }, #{ menu_seq } )

INSERT INTO MENUS ( MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_SEQ ) VALUES ( ( SELECT 'MENU' || TRIM( TO_CHAR( NVL( MAX ( SUBSTR( MENU_ID, 5, 2) ) , '00')+1, '00') ) FROM MENUS ) , #{ menu_name }, ( SELECT NVL(MAX(MENU_SEQ), 0) + 1 FROM MENUS ) )
mapper.select: SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NAME, MENU_SEQ FROM MENUS ORDER BY MENU_SEQ ASC
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MENUS WHERE MENU_ID = #{ menu_id }
